subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The day after Mets closer Jenrry Mejia had been suspended for testing positive for a banned substance, Bartolo Colon led the team to a 4-3 victory over the Braves in Atlanta, including his first R.B.I. since 2005.
snippet: The day after Mets closer Jenrry Mejia had been suspended for testing positive for a banned substance, Bartolo Colon led the team to a 4-3 victory over the Braves in Atlanta, including his first R.B.I. since 2005.
